topic.title: For IFS seedboxes. Raise ti size limit of optional files!
topic.body:
I'm seeing that my mp3 that are larger than 10 MB are not well seeded. To solve this problem i suggest to raise the size limit for optional files at least to 20 MB in order to seed all mp3 correctly (i did this with my seedbox and now my machine is downloading the remaining files, hope to recover what i lost). If you want you can use also an higher size limit to auto-seed also the big files, i'm evaluating also this.

I also suggest to implement the blocklists on the seedboxes to auto-block cp and illegal content.

topic.title: My IFS seedbox is now always-online!
topic.body:
It will auto-seed any file hosted on IFS cluster 1 that is smaller than 400 MB. A specific seed outside this limit can be asked to me by replying this message.

My node  begins some weeks ago to download all old files... the server is working behind the TOR network to guarantee my security. Please connect your peer to the TOR network to upload the files you are hosting on my machine. 

If you communicate me that you uploaded a specific file i will control for it in my machine. sometimes a delay can exist when the bandwidth of the node is saturated. (now is downloading old files...this can happens very often)

The node will exclude only files created by users included in all public blocklistes for illegal activities.

I will not host HD videos due to te large amount of resources that these files will consume. If you want to share on my machine a vid, compress it or make it at low definition and within the limit above. You can use these ffmpeg option to do this:

-f mp4 -b:v 400k -r 29.97 -aspect 16:9 -vcodec libx264 -b:a 80k -acodec aac -movflags faststart

topic.body:

For example i uploaded the most controversial and viewed movie on Netflix at the link below (maybe you must await some seconds or minutes to sync your node, but after that the streaming should go smooth). PLease have fun and seed!

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BLnYeYMYhCQUiCVQKesJwa22Jzpcdd3Y6/index.html?view:item+id:15f1_1Q2qKCMd4BMDFsdHEsXzRspod6hS5duMHF_item_8+type:video

My plan is to keep my seedbox online until the network will become indipendent for larger files as actually is for small zites and audio files, but to reach this objective we need more SEEDS! Please! Use IFS for streaming also YOUR FILES! :)

I used MystiQ software to compress video files as much as needed to stream them also without the seedbox (using a flat connection also from a single node). i suggest to use these FFMPEG options to convert video files to the compressed format that i'm using:

-f mp4 -b:v 400k -r 29.97 -aspect 16:9 -vcodec libx264 -b:a 80k -acodec aac -movflags faststart

MystiQ is a GUI for FFMPEG that can make the conversion task easily. The FFMPEG options can be changed in advanced settings

https://mystiqapp.com/

Like the ones you can find on archive.org for public domain movies. To be barely watchable, you'd need at least 3gb for an one hour movie. Though, I prefer the ones exceeding 10gb, of course.  [...]

the streaming on IFS can be done also by using TOR (useful for places like china) but the bitrate cannot be to high (HD videos) because of the limits of flat internet connections. Anyway if you want a better quality you can use a normal bittorrent client or upload the videos in .zip format on IFS if you want a serverless option (using Magnet URLS from zerotorrent if you want a decentralized archive for torrents).

For me using a serverless approach is a solution to create a real free network where none can censor you or hide you inside a filter bubble . it is true that you can find all these things in others clearnet sites...but you are really free by using them or you are seeing only what these sites want show?
